summary: Carman must enter the boxing ring once again. Even though the doctor has advised him against it, he picks up his gloves for one last fight, for his father, for his church, for his love, and for his life.
cast: Carman|Michael Nouri|Patricia Manterola|Jeremy Williams|Jed Allan|Romeo Fabian|Betty Carvalho|Jay Arlen Jones|Bill Boggs|Steve Albert|Hector Elias|Kevin Rankin|Simon Brooke|Scott L. Schwartz|Eric Mosely|Cory Hodges|Robert Catrini|PaSean Wilson|John Runner|Bob Papenbrook|Calvin Dean|Scott St. James|Lorielle New|Delaina Mitchell|Kenneth Meseroll|Jesse Dabson|Kimmarie Johnson|Keith MacKechnie|Ilise Fertig|Dennis Inman|Doc Duhame|Zack Duhame|Joseph DiSante|Mark Hicks|Steve Hulin|Mark A. Watters|Michael St. Claire|Quinn Gonzalez|Joseph Hickok|Jared Huckaby|Thomas Longo|Msaada Nia
title: Carman: The Champion
